text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia boermani is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell size varies between 2.4 mm and 2.7 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the southeast North Atlantic off Mauritania.
text.External links:
"Odostomia (Odostomia) boermani". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 9 November 2011.
